newsitem.title: FRANCE: French capital markets closing report.
newsitem.headline: French capital markets closing report.

text.p: French bond futures closed slightly higher after trading in a 16-basis point range, with few operators showing much interest as the London futures market and other major European bourses were closed in the afternoon.

"Less than 6,000 lots on the notionnel speaks for itself. Nothing is happening, and when I say 'nothing' that's saying too much," said a trader a large brokerage. Another said, "It's idiotic to stay open this afternoon when the rest (of Europe) is closed and the banks are closed. All our clients have gone."
The spread between 10-year German and French bonds remained steady at minus four basis points.
